entry.title: My First Post
entry.summary: This is a test to see if I can get something working
entry.content:
First Post

Pelican is not as easy as people make it out to be. If you want the website on github.io and you also want the source code to be up there as well you need to do some interesting workarounds.
And then if you don't have access to a way to run make then you need to recreate them as batch files.
It is all quite confusing but hopefully I will get it to work eventually.
